name: Piedro
description:
Piedro ( maximize when playing please )

Piedro? Oh, I am sorry. I thought you were poor Piedro.

His destiny was so sad. Do you want to know what happened to him?  Yes? Ok, then play the game. 

After playing it spread the sad story of Piedro to your friends. We must remember Piedro because he gave his life to gather the artefacts that could have destroyed us.

Find all artefacts Piedro. FIND THEM!

----------

ARTEFACTS:

( hold cursor over them )
